entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a person who interjected in the conversation, referring to himself and others as 'us'.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is a person who was caught by Greyback and his group.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a person who laughed at the mention of gold and struggled to throw off her brother-in-law.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is Bellatrix's brother-in-law, who threw off his sister-in-law and ripped up his own sleeve.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person whose limited line of vision was affected by Bellatrix's movement out of sight.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is an organization that Bellatrix and Lucius are afraid will come if they touch the Mark.

relationships.description: Greyback caught Potter, as mentioned in the conversation.
Bellatrix and Lucius are afraid of the Dark Lord, as mentioned in their conversation.
Lucius has a Mark that he is trying to protect.
Bellatrix does not want gold, as mentioned in her conversation with Greyback and Lucius.
